meta.title: Akorede jamal | Full Stack Developer
meta.description: Portfolio website showcasing full stack development work and skills

about.bio: I create user-centered digital experiences that solve real problems. Passionate about accessibility and ethical design with over 5 years of experience in product design and user experience research.
focus: Creating intuitive and accessible websites and web interfaces
Leading design teams and establishing design systems
Conducting user research to inform product decisions

experience.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
experience.description: Motivated and detail-oriented aspiring software engineer with two months remaining in a 10-month Professional Development Certificate (PDC) program at SQI. Proficient in a full stack of technologies including React.js, Node.js, and Express, with practical experience in building and deploying web applications. Eager to leverage skills in front-end and back-end development to contribute to innovative projects and grow as a software developer.
achievements: Developed and maintained core web application features using React.js and Node.js
Implemented responsive designs to enhance user experience across devices by 30%
Collaborated with a team to deliver a project, optimize data flow and integrate RESTful APIs

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design intuitive and engaging user experiences for various client projects. Created wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity designs for web and mobile applications.
achievements: Designed interfaces for 12+ client projects across fintech, healthcare, and e-commerce
Improved conversion rates by an average of 22% through data-driven design iterations
Mentored junior designers and facilitated design thinking workshops

experience.title: Freelance Developer
experience.description: Worked as a freelance developer, assisting the design team in creating user interface components. I also collaborated with clients to understand their requirements and deliver tailored solutions, by creating custom websites that met their needs, managed projects from concept to launch, and ensured client satisfaction.
achievements: Redesigned the company website, improving mobile responsiveness
Provided adequate maintenance and updates for client websites
Delivered projects on time and within budget, leading to repeat business

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
